title: Crops with Highest Average Pesticide Cost

content.question:

The graph shows the average energy-based operating costs for commercially grown crops and industrialized raised livestock in the United States.

The graph shows the average energy-based operating costs for commercially grown crops and industrialized raised livestock in the United States.

(a) Based on the information in the graph, identify the category of crops that has the highest average pesticide cost.
(b) Based on the information in the graph, identify the category with the greatest energy-based expense in hog farming.
(c) Based on the information in the graph, explain why there is a difference in electricity costs between beef cattle production and dairy farming.
(d) Describe one environmental problem associated with the energy-based expense that is highest in the production of corn.

(e) A beef cattle farmer wanting to reduce the ecological footprint of the operation decides to shift from cattle farming to wheat farming. Other than energy-based expenses, explain how this change in business practice will affect the ecological footprint of the farm.

(f) A wheat farmer is considering installing <math alttext="P V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PV</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> solar panels at the farm to help reduce the farm’s energy-based expenses. Considering the energy-based expenses shown in the graph, explain why this would or would not be an effective long-term approach for reducing energy costs.

(g) Homeowners can reduce their ecological footprint through conservation landscaping techniques. Describe how conservation landscaping techniques can reduce home electricity consumption during hot summers.
